                                  6.1% 2-Axle Trucks (PCE = 1.5)             0.005        0.003          0.008             0.003       0.006       0.009   0.132

                                 13.9% 3-Axle Trucks (PCE = 2.0)             0.016        0.009          0.025             0.009       0.019       0.028   0.400

    Trip Generation Source: Institute of Transportation Engineers (ITE), Trip Generation Manual, Eighth Edition (2008).

                                                                                  Major Street - Total of Both Approaches (VPH)

                                                                          1 Lane (Major) & 1 Lane (Minor)
                                                                          2+ Lanes (Major) & 1 Lane (Minor) OR 1 Lane (Major) & 2+ Lanes (Minor)
                                                                          2+ Lanes (Major) & 2+ Lanes (Minor)
                                                                          Major Street Approaches
                                                                          Minor Street Approaches



                                                            *Note: 100 vph applies as the lower threshold for a minor-street approach with two or more lanes
                                                                         and 75 vph applies as the lower threshold for a minor-street approach

            1 1,850                     1 350                                        12,000          8,400       1,200           850
          2+                            1                                            14,400         10,080       1,200           850
          2+                          2+                                             14,400         10,080       1,600         1,120
            1                         2+                                             12,000          8,400       1,600         1,120
          Combination of CONDITIONS A + B
           Satisfied                 Not Satisfied
                                          XX                                               2 CONDITIONS                  2 CONDITIONS
No one condition satisfied, but following conditions                                           80%                           80%
fulfilled 80% of more .....        A              B
                                 21%            22%

          Note: To be used only for NEW INTERSECTIONS or other locations where it is not reasonable
                to count actual traffic volumes.

     The satisfaction of a traffic signal warrant or warrants shall not in itself require the installation of a traffic control signal.

fulfilled 80% of more .....        A              B

DR =       34.6 (pc/mi/ln)                                                                 DR =         (pc/mi/ln)

Final Sat.: 3502 3610 1615 1805 3610 2842 3502 3610 1615 3502 3502           93
------------|---------------||---------------||---------------||---------------|
Capacity Analysis Module:
Vol/Sat:     0.05 0.03 0.00 0.03 0.03 0.45 0.17 0.13 0.05 0.00 0.11 0.11
Crit Moves: ****                   ****             ****        ****
Green/Cycle: 0.10 0.32 0.32 0.10 0.32 0.57 0.25 0.31 0.31 0.10 0.16 0.16

Calculate Flow Adjustments
 fp                                       1.00                                 ER                                    1.2
 ET                                       1.5                                  fHV = 1/[1+PT(ET - 1) + PR(ER - 1)]   0.926
